name: Adrenaline
description: Health drops grant you 120% Movement Speed for 2s.

name: Biohazard
description: 12% chance to deal 320 damage over time

name: Backstab
description: When behind your target, you apply a poison dealing 2% of your target's maximum HP over 3s, stacking 3 times.

name: Catalyst
description: Increase the chance that any of your proc chance cards will trigger by 100%

name: Circle of Life
description: Enemies hit by Time Bomb drop a Health Nugget that heals for 400

name: Cloak
description: Hidden lasts 2s longer, removes you from combat, you may stealth while mounted, and Hidden's Cooldown is reduced by 3s

name: Decay
description: Your weapon shots have a 12% chance to apply Zombie, reducing enemy healing by 25%

name: Collateral
description: You deal 40% damage to all targets near your main target

name: Diminish
description: Your Weapon Shots have a 10% chance to reduce your target's damage by 40% for 2s

name: Disruption
description: Your Weapon Shots have a 16% chance to hex the target deactivating all their cards for 3s

name: Emergency Exit
description: You automatically enter stealth when you drop below 30% Health and Gain 10% movement speed for 4s

name: Endure
description: You can take 2000 additional damage before being revealed out of stealth

name: Exit Strategy
description: Exit combat 2s faster, and regenerate an additional 8% of your max Health each second

name: Gotta Go
description: If damage removes you from Stealth, gain +30% Movement Speed for 3s

name: Innumerable
description: Deals 20% more damage per enemy player hit.

name: Isolation
description: Deal +60% more damage when your target has no allies within 125 ft.

name: Killstreak
description: +20% damage per kill, max 5. Expires on death.

name: Lethal Dose
description: Poison enemies for 320 bonus damage over 4s.

name: Lie in Wait
description: After 1s of standing still and being out of combat, regenerate 240 Health each second

name: Master Riding
description: Your mounting time is reduced, and you gain 30% Movement Speed while mounted

name: Paranoia
description: Fear enemies for 1.2s

name: Re-entry
description: After using Time Bomb, enter Stealth and restore 20% max Health.

name: Scales of Justice
description: Deal 100% more damage to the targets with higher power levels.

name: Shell Shock
description: Your weapon attacks have a 12% chance to slow your target's Attack Speed by 10% for 2s

name: Short Fuse
description: Time Bomb explodes 1s faster, and has a +25% increased explosion radius.

name: Special Delivery
description: Time Bomb's cooldown refreshes twice as fast while mounted.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: Reduce Time Bomb's radius by 75%. Now sticks to targets that are nearby and deals 200 damage

name: Surprise Attack
description: Your first shot out of stealth applies a Poison dealing 200 damage over 3s

name: Victory Rush
description: Gain +25% Attack Speed for 12s after getting a kill.

name: Weakening Poison
description: Poison Bolt shots apply a 4% stacking slow for 3s. Max 3 stacks

name: Well Rested
description: When above 80% Health, your Attack Speed is increased by 50%

name: Smother
description: Increase the duration and radius of smoke screen by 20%

name: Tactical Reload
description: Gain 3 max ammo count. Dealing a killing blow to a player instantly restores 5 ammo.

name: Billow
description: While inside your own Smoke Screen, you reduce Crowd Control by 40%

name: Blowout
description: Time Bomb has a +8% increased explosion radius

name: Pollute
description: Enemy Pet inside of Smoke screen are stunned for 2s

name: Preparation
description: On successful kill, lower all your active Cooldowns by 25%

name: Short Fuse
description: Poison Time Bomb explodes 0.3s faster

name: Specter
description: Enter Stealth that lasts 2s immediately upon entering your own Smoke Screen

name: Contagion
description: Increase the duration of all Damage Over Time effects by 10%

name: Corrode
description: Increase the maximum number of stacks of Poison Bolts by 1

name: Mutagen
description: Hitting a target with Smoke Screen instantly consumes all active DOTs, dealing 25% of the remaining damage

name: Confound
description: Enemies hit by Smoke Screen are Confused for 2s
